thread.title: Everyone who "loves" Donald Trump
thread.title_full: Everyone who "loves" Donald Trump - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Everyone who "loves" Donald Trump
text:
Steve Helber/AP Donald Trump feels the love of all people. Donald Trump has a long list of admirers.
That is, if you ask Donald Trump.
The Republican Presidential candidate, currently sitting at a field-leading 27% in the latest polls , is never slow to point out that there are many people who "love" him.
If you ask The Donald, he clearly believes heâ€™s wooed by people that include some of the biggest names around the globe.
Here are just a few of the people and groups that Trump believes loves him:
Tom Brady
This might be Trump's most tortured friendship.
In the wake of the Deflategate investigation, Trump kindly leapt to Tom Brady's defense, saying the man he called "my friend" should "sue the hell" out of the NFL.
The New England Patriots quarterback then gave a somewhat tongue-in-cheek endorsement of Trump. "That would be great," Brady said then of a Trump White House .
Touchdown Tom later claimed he was taken "out of context" and that his vote was "my own personal choice." Hopefully for Donald, Tom remembers the one he loves.
Andy Lyons/Getty Images Patriots QB Tom Brady and Trump have been in kind of an on-again, off-again fling. Bill Clinton
LUCAS JACKSON/REUTERS The former President wants to #MakeAmericaGreatAgain, at least according to Donald. Here's the most recent claim of a Trump bromance.
The Donald posted a video on Instagram of the former President saying flattering things about him.
